meanings.definition: (of a horse) Make a characteristic sound, similar to a whinny.
meanings.sent1: The horse hinnied loudly in the field.
meanings.sent2: She knew her horse was happy when it hinnied in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The horse hinnied as if telling a joke to the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the horse hinnied through the peaceful meadow.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled as the horse hinnied playfully.
